dt: {bc}to shut down and restart (a computer or program)

dt.t: … the annoyance of having to {wi}reboot{/wi} the computer to switch operating systems …
If anything ever happens to the original drive, you can {wi}reboot{/wi} using the cloned drive and be up and running in minutes.

dt: {bc}to start up again after closing or shutting down {bc}to boot up again
